Html:
Hello,
I see that there was a WPF/Prism/MVVM event that was in Boise last week that I unfortunately missed.

http://karlshifflett.wordpress.com/2011/05/12/registration-open-for-prism-unity-wpf-mvvm-boise-training-event/

Does anyone know of anyone that offers training similar to that?

Thank you.

Keep an eye on:  http://www.pluralsight-training.net/microsoft/

Brian Lagunas will be posting Prism training videos very soon.

Karl
